actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A bill to strengthen student achievement and graduation rates and prepare children and youth for college, careers, and citizenship through innovative partnerships that meet the comprehensive needs of children and youth.
short_title: Developing Innovative Partnerships and Learning Opportunities that Motivate Achievement Act
subjects: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

summary.text:
Developing Innovative Partnerships and Learning Opportunities that Motivate Achievement Act or the DIPLOMA Act

This bill authorizes the Department of Education to award grants to states and, through them, subgrants to consortia of local educational agencies and community partners to address school readiness and achievement. Subgrants may be used for activities including early learning, academic support services, parent-education programs, and teacher training.

titles.title: Developing Innovative Partnerships and Learning Opportunities that Motivate Achievement Act

A bill to strengthen student achievement and graduation rates and prepare children and youth for college, careers, and citizenship through innovative partnerships that meet the comprehensive needs of children and youth.
